about_the_game:
Ancient Horse Theft

Hustlerix is an open-world, top-down action game, where you step into the sandals of Gaul, a hero molded in the crucible of adversity. Jump straight into a stunningly detailed, isometric world inspired by ancient Rome, teeming with vibrant landscapes, bustling cities, and deadly arenas. Challenge the authority of the corrupt Senate, and etch your legacy into this epic period. It's your destiny to uncover the truth behind the mysterious forces that are secretly manipulating the course of history.

Slay Mythical Beasts

Engage in riveting dialogues, interspersed with philosophical debates that will test your knowledge and cunning. Stand up against oppressive laws, stone villains to ensure justice, and best monstrous beasts straight out of the folklore of the time. Encounter the infamous Minotaur, the relentless Hydra, and a plethora of other mythological adversaries on your quest to become a true legend.

Master the Art of War

Hone your combat prowess as you duel against Roman soldiers, utilizing a robust combat system that combines strategic decision-making with reflex-based action. Wrestle against fierce gladiators in the blood-soaked sands of the Colosseum, stake your claim in exhilarating chariot races, and hurl massive menhirs at those who dare to challenge you.

Shape Your Destiny

Embark on thrilling quests, each more perilous than the last, as you navigate this ruthless world. Face off against infamous historical figures, outwit cunning thieves, and brawl with patrolling legionnaires. Indulge your rebellious side by becoming a notorious horse thief, or direct your rage towards the corrupt, plundering wealthy civilians to distribute wealth among the needy.

Find Peace Amidst the Chaos

But it's not all battle and bloodshed. Hustlerix also offers quieter moments to unwind. Experience the simple pleasures of the era, be it relishing a hearty meal in a roadside tavern, enjoying the melodious tunes of wandering bards, or participating in lively banter with citizens around the campfire. You can even take a moment to appreciate the stunning vistas, thanks to the game's dynamic day-night cycle and weather system.

Satire and Wisdom in a Game That Blurs Eras

This rich open-world experience is further enhanced with an undercurrent of contemporary satire, seamlessly weaving allusions to our modern world into the fabric of ancient Rome. Hustlerix is more than just a game - it's a window to the past, a challenging philosophical journey, and a poignant commentary on our own time.



With an array of audacious tasks to undertake, epic figures to confront, and an immersive world to explore, Hustlerix promises an unforgettable gaming experience that appeals to the inner hustler in everyone.

short_description: Play as Gaul in the ancient world in this action-packed, open-world game & with a classic gameplay style. Defeat mythological beasts, and overthrow senators. Experience gladiator fights, chariot races, and stone-throwing. Abolish slavery and carve your path to freedom.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Simplified Chinese
